articles.author: Trevor Mogg
articles.title: In space, astronauts perform cleaning chores in style - Digital Trends
articles.description: Life on the space station isn’t all science experiments and Earth photography, as demonstrated by this video released by the European Space Agency.
articles.content:
Life on the International Space Station isnt all science experiments and Earth photography.
Mundane housework duties also have to be fulfilled in order to keep the orbiting outpost spick and span.
… [+1817 chars]

articles.title: James Webb Space Telescope launches this month, here's the science behind it - India Today
articles.description: The telescope will blast off on an Ariane 5 rocket from Europe's Spaceport in French Guiana on December 22.

articles.title: French cheese product imported by Cold Storage recalled due to 'possible' presence of bacteria - channelnewsasia.com
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A cheese product imported from France has been recalled due to the "possible presence" of listeria monocytogenes, a bacteria that can cause foodborne illness. 

The recall for Cantorel’s Plateau 5 Fromages was first issued by a European Commissio…
